name: Scry
flavor: See through the eyes of a willing creature.

purposeDescriptions.low: links the caster's sensations with another willing creature, allowing them to trade vague feelings from their senses
purposeDescriptions.mid: links the caster's sensations with another willing creature, allowing them to trade any or all of their sense with each other
purposeDescriptions.high: forms a telepathic bond, allowing the caster to trade any or all senses with the target creature and vaguely control them with focus
